Class JsonWebToken

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.security.JsonWebToken
@Service public final class JsonWebToken extends Object
JSON Web Token Implementation Supports Secret Key based and Public / Private Key based Token Generation invalid input: '&' Validation.
Version:
1.0
Author:
arafkarsh

    setKeyCloakPublicKey()
    This is set when the Applications Boots Up from the Servlet Event Listener Servlet Event Listener ensures that the public key is downloaded from the KeyCloak Server Set the Validator Key as KeyCloak Public Key if the Public Key downloaded from KeyCloak.

    • init

      Initialize the JsonWebToken with Token Type (Secret or Public/Private Keys) and other default claims settings.
      Returns:

    • setKeyCloakPublicKey

      public void setKeyCloakPublicKey()
      This is set when the Applications Boots Up from the Servlet Event Listener Servlet Event Listener ensures that the public key is downloaded from the KeyCloak Server Set the Validator Key as KeyCloak Public Key if the Public Key downloaded from KeyCloak.

    • setTokenAuthExpiry

      Set the Token Expiry Time - MUST NOT BE GREATER THAN 30 MINS IF YES THEN SET EXPIRY TO 5 MINS

      _time -
      Returns:
